title: Economist Alex Krüger Says Bitcoin Bull Market Still Early, Sees Institutional Sales Machine Ramping Up in Months
description:
A widely followed economist believes Bitcoin is far from witnessing the full impact of the recently approved spot market BTC exchange-traded funds (ETFs).
